participant_1.background:
I enjoyed Comic Con with my husband last year.
I'm not allowed to have pets because I live with my parents and they are allergic.
i do not like my job.
I enjoy sharing my love of music and unicorns with others.
My hunting dog is the most valuable thing I own because he is my best friend and a loyal companion.

participant_2.background:
I don't care that much about social media because I have better things to do with my time.
I love my family, but they don't always understand my love for McDonald's or Mortal Kombat.
i prefer winter over fall.
I celebrated my birthday with my family and friends at a Chinese restaurant.
I am so proud of my daughter for graduating at the top of her class!

content.text: My day is going great, thanks for asking! How is yours?
It's going well so far. I just got back from Comic Con last night, and I had a lot of fun.
That's awesome! I've never been to Comic Con, but I've always wanted to go. What was your favorite part of the experience?
My favorite part was getting to meet all of the different people who are fans of the same things I am. It was really cool to be able to talk to people who get my obsession with pop culture.
That's awesome! I'm glad you had a good time.
So, what are some of your other hobbies?
I love music and unicorns. I also like to share my love of these things with others.
That's cool! I love music too. What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but my favorite is probably alternative rock.
Nice! I love alternative rock too. Some of my favorite bands are The Killers, The Black Keys, and The Strokes.
Those are all great bands! I love The Killers and The Black Keys too.
Cool! It's always nice to meet someone who shares my musical taste.
